# 仪式魔法

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yishi-mofa
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yishi-mofa
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yishi-mofa
yishi-mofa <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yishi-mofa
yishi-mofa <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
